Is it possible to save a Chart within a FlowDocument to file. I add a chart and it displays fine on screen, then when it is saved to a XamlPackage using the code below but file doesn't contain the Chart, and when loaded and displayed this detail is missing.

var range = new TextRange(Document.ContentStart, Document.ContentEnd);
using (var stream = System.IO.File.Create(filename))

}
